snippet: The photographer Sara Hylton was warmly welcomed by Muslims in Midwood, Brooklyn, but not until after she donned a head scarf. Then that world opened up to her.
abstract: Photojournalist Sara Hylton chronicles life in Little Pakistan, Muslim community in Midwood, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Sara Hylton was warmly welcomed by Muslims in Midwood, Brooklyn, but not until after she donned a head scarf. Then that world opened up to her.

headline.print_headline: A Culture Apart,  Yet Not Too Far
headline.main: Sara Hylton’s Images Depict Little Pakistan’s Quiet Conflicts
